example: Remove [the MPSC]{REG} [from the splenic vein]{COND} and [the IVC graft]{REG} [on the IHIVC]{COND}
Transfer [the solution]{REG} with {pasteur pipette}[Device] into [the vials]{Container}
Add [50 μl]{Volume} of [buffer solution]{REG} to the [reaction mixture]{REG}.
Dilute the [10% stock solution]{Concentration} to obtain a [2% solution]{Concentration} for further use.
Preheat the oven to [180 degrees]{Temperature} before baking the cake.
Measure the [20 g]{Mass} of the solid [sample]{REG} using a digital scale.
Cut the piece of fabric to a [length of 2 meters]{Length} for sewing the dress.
Set the [centrifugal speed to 5000 rpm]{Speed} and spin the samples for 10 minutes at room temperature.
